document_data.caption: Cover of ''Pages from the Mages''.
document_data.title: Pages from the Mages
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]] with [[Tim Beach]]
document_data.realm year: c. [[1357 DR]]<ref group="note">''Pages from the Mages'' provides no precise dates, only things happening X years ago, and mostly reprints from earlier sourcebooks like the ''[[Forgotten Realms Campaign Set]]'' and ''[[The Magister (sourcebook)]]'' (both assumed to be 1357 DR), without changing their own references to things happening X years ago. Therefore, dates should be decided based on earlier works, but 1357 DR may be assumed for most spellbooks.
document_data.Description:
''Pages from the Mages'' is the 8{{th}} book in the [[FOR series]]. It features an array of [[spell]]s structured in a unique format that showcases several [[spellbook]]s of the Realms. The accessory not only catalogs these spellbooks but also explores into their origins, providing comprehensive backgrounds on the magicians who authored them. Additionally, it offers insights into the current locations where these spellbooks might be discovered by characters.

The majority of spellbooks detailed in this accessory are repositories of spells that are widely recognized within the Realms. However, the spells specifically outlined in this accessory are predominantly distinctive spells, many of which bear the names of their creators. These spellbooks have been historically sought after by various characters within the Realms.
document_data.Contents:
* Introduction
* Spells of the Realms
* Spellbooks
* Mage Sigils of the Realms
* New Monsters
